message: Starting critique review - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Analyzing code - examining state_db.py review logic and error handling patterns
Examining architectural patterns - checking lifecycle.py nested locks and migration status
Formulating senior dev critique - architectural assessment and recommendations

Senior dev critique completed and submitted. Key findings: (1) Architectural concern - SQLite migration 60% complete creating hybrid state, (2) Review flow design incomplete - needs_revision verdict ignored, (3) Error handling inconsistent across codebase with 30+ bare except blocks, (4) Race conditions are symptoms of incomplete migration, (5) SQLite transaction handling is excellent - proper pattern throughout. Submitted 10 observations spanning architectural, technical debt, and security concerns with 8 actionable recommendations prioritized by timeframe.
